user.title: Login to Google
user.description: Please provide login credentials to a linked google account of your google home and nest devices. If you are using 2-factor authentication, you need to use an application password. You may delete the application password once the integration is sucessfully setup. If you encounter a problem with the login, you can also provide a self-fetched master token in the appropriate field (this field can be left empty if the username and password combination is working for you).

data.consider_home: Timeout (in seconds) until a device is again considered 'not_home'
